alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fond Du Lac; Milwaukee; Ozaukee; Sheboygan; Washington; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 8:49PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ozaukee, northern Milwaukee, southern Fond du Lac, northern Waukesha, Washington, eastern Dodge and southwestern Sheboygan Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 849 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Horicon to Milwaukee. Movement was northeast at 85 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northern Milwaukee, Wauwatosa, Fond Du Lac, Brookfield, Menomonee Falls, West Bend, Mequon, Beaver Dam, Hartford, Whitefish Bay, Brown Deer, Grafton, Cedarburg, Waupun, Port Washington, Sussex, Hartland, Jackson, Fox Point, and Mayville. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 151 between mile markers 131 and 163. Wisconsin Highway 26 near mile marker 53. Interstate 43 between mile markers 77 and 113. Interstate 41 between mile markers 45 and 95. U.S. Highway 45 between mile markers 61 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Dodge; Fond Du Lac; Milwaukee; Ozaukee; Sheboygan; Washington; Waukesha
